title: For Want of Wonders
description: A young boy sees something he does not understand. On a beach, from a distance, he sees a woman. She seems to command the elements. There is beauty and there is perfection. That memory stays with him, awakening a desire for truth and meaning.Like a river seeking the ocean, Vishesh's life flows from that single moment. "The want is the thing that drives us," he says. "Trust me. I have a story to tell."
author: Richard Payment
